full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE DPAL 'BYOR LHUN GRUB KYI SKYES RABS LA BSTOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES DUS GSUM RGYAL BA THAMS CAD KYI NGO BO DPAL LDAN BLA MA DAM PA, 'KHON STON RDO RJE 'CHANG DPAL 'BYOR LHUN GRUB KYI SKYES RABS KYI PHRENG BA LA BSTOD PA SMON LAM DANG BCAS PA 'DI YANG RJE NYID KYI GSUNG 'BUM RNAMS PHYOGS GCIG TU DPON YIG AU RGYAN, CHOS NOR BU LA RGYAL GSUM GYIS YI GE PA BYAS TE, GLEGS BAM LA BKOD PA'I TSE BLA MA'I BKA' 'BANGS ZA HOR GYI BTZUN PA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSOS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BLO BZANG NOR BU'O, ,)
author_simple: NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO,
